name: The Imbalance
description:
Fighting off an alien attack aboard your ship, you must manualy deliver fuel to the ship's engines to stablise and keep balance it's systems. You must survive 3 minuets of onslaught before the technicians fix the fuel line.

**WebGL audio is little a glitchy for some reason. I recomend downloading if it annoys you.**

WASD - Move
E - Interact
J -  Shoot

Created by Sean Gilbert for Ludum Dare 49
